misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing the Keimola Golf club with distinction. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Timo has secured three Hector Trophée victories in eight appearances, a testament to his skill and competitive spirit.

Off the course, Timo is celebrated for his ambassadorship of the AimPoint method, a revolutionary approach to putting that has garnered attention from players and coaches alike. His dedication to refining his game extends beyond the physical, embracing innovative techniques to gain a competitive edge.

While Timo will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his influence on the tournament remains significant. His past performances serve as inspiration to fellow competitors, and his expertise in the AimPoint method continues to shape the strategies of aspiring golfers. A true ambassador for the sport, Timo's presence will be missed on the greens.
